Snortips::Stop (  ) 

Stops module process(es).

Tries PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT times.

Returns:
boolean TRUE if the process killed successfully

Deletes a list of IPs from a list.

Snortips::PrintBlockedIPsForm (  ) 

Displays a list of blocked, blacklisted, or whitelisted IPs.

Also allows the user to add or delete blocked IPs.

Todo:
Do not run this command if SnortIPS is not running

Only admin can delete/add hosts

Only admin can delete/add hosts

Only admin can delete/add hosts
